fields.name: Charles Simons
fields.about: He is our the youngest crew member who become an instructor just few years ago. Previously he was working as a snowboards desk maker for his father's company. Funny thing is, when he was 16 he said: 'I will never become a snowboarder, it's to hard..'. Know he is fully trained, very skilled snowboard trainer in our school. His life make a 180 degress turn from, not believing in himself to training people who have same attitude as he had many years ago. As you can see nothing is impossilbe so let's get on snowboard desks and ride down  on our slopes.

fields.name: Jhon Smith
fields.about: Jumps, tricks, snow stunts ? What else you want to know ? Jhon is our great freestyle snowboarder. He won a gold medal at the 2018 World Championships in slopestyle. If you want to skill up with new trickes, combinations on halfpipe, slopes etc, He will be the best to show you how to do it from the beginign till the end. Jhon is the most talented trainer in our crew. Hope you will agree with us about his great attitude and open style of riding.

fields.name: Carla Gibson
fields.about: You probably would not believe, if we will tell you that Carla is our Babel Mountaint. She knows 5 different languages: English, French, Spanish, Portugesse, German. She is our real 'google translator'. If you will have any trouble understanding anything, just let her know. She's the best person on the earth to explain you everything, she is always doing it slowly so you can understand it in your language or any of her foreign languages. She loves to spent time with kids on the slopes as it is giving her lot's of fun. Ps. She's a bit of singer too..

fields.name: Carl Norton
fields.about: He has two passions snowboarding and skiinng. He can't live without any of them. He always making jokes about it. 'How to learn skiing very quikcly? Learn how to ride on snowboard and then jump on some rails to break it in half. There you go, now you're a skii rider, hehe.' He is always happy to help you. Carl is a two-time Olympic gold medalist, gold medla on 'Snowboarding at the 2018 Winter Olympics - Men's Halfpipe'. He is ours school treasure.

fields.name: David Bright
fields.about: Our number One with over 12 winter seasons under his belt! He is training all our instructors for BASI since we started working together. He has a huge technical knwoledge, lots of patience and teachnig skills honed through countless hours of traning snowboarders. David is traning everybody, from the first-timers to the hgihest level skilled riders. We can truly say he is our 'Guru of snow'.

fields.name: Garry McGregor
fields.about: Garry is our managing director and one of the founders of Arctic School. He is verry focused on coordinating the different parts of Arctic School and he is ensuring we are moving in same (hopefully right) direction. He started his journey with snowboarding, as a instructor when he was 22. He alwas loved snowboarding and teaching. Most of the time he's traveling between our resorts to spent time with all of us and make sure everything we need is provided right on time! He always wantet to work in a positive enviroment with great people and he is trying to make Arctic School such a place.

fields.name: Katie Olson
fields.about: As you all probably seen my picture above.. yes I am always responding on all your emails, always. Even when I am riding, hehe. As much as I love riding, I also love helping and staying connect with all of you guys. Maybe I am not the best in training, but I can asure you all, I'm the best from this team, to make your life easier, when you booking your lessons or when making queries. Hope to see you soon on snowy slopes!

fields.name: Jake Blake
fields.about: Jake's responsibility here is to create, a relaxed atmosphere in teaching sessions, to put the most nervous firs-timers at ease. With the lots of experience and knwoldge he is ensuring that even a technical minded fresstyle rider will come away having learnt somethinf new and excitin. He is always very creative, believe me, you will never get borred. When it's hard snowing and you can't ride, you will probably make an IGLO and make sausages over thie fire.
